lexUnit.name: joke.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: say something to cause amusement

sentence.text: To give an example , incest may exist simply as a prohibition at the level of the formal system but at the practical level , breaches of the prohibition are explained , joked about or criticized .
` They let me in on the secret quite early -- then people started joking about it .
I heard an older couple joking about it : ` I do n't care what kind of burial I have , " he said , ` as long as I 'm on top of her . "
The way they joke about their LP going to 207 “ with an anchor ” , the way they break down the myths of the American Dream and the Troubles back home …
` People making jokes about poppadam crumbs ?
` They always talk and joke among themselves .
They leant against the gate , not expecting trouble as they joked between themselves .

His marital troubles seemed far from his mind as he laughed and joked with the celebrity audience including actresses Patricia Routledge , Alison Steadman , and Frances Barber at the National Theatre .

Outwardly she had seemed no different -- she 'd laughed and joked with the customers , dealt with any business matters competently and efficiently , managed to get things back on to an even keel at the club .
Confirmed secularists joked with Islamic fundamentalists at a high-security press conference called to mark the signing of a 12-point unity charter outlining a transition to democracy .
Most evenings now he was very cheerful and joked with her and played games with Oliver ; after they had gone to bed he usually went round to the pub to calm his nerves .
I was unresponsive and kept joking with him about it -- but I made it clear I was n't interested .
The man murmured his commiserations and she joked with him .
He 'd hired a smart car for their visit ; he joked with Mary Rose about driving on the right side of the road .
She was even joking with the nurses as they did it , " she recalls .
By the second day of the trip , Lorna was laughing and joking with Trevor in his clown gear .
He joked briefly with a woman in a lilac cardigan at a desk .
She had eyes only for him ; as they twirled around , they were joking together , and were clearly very much in love .
But they seemed on good terms , always fraternizing and joking together : a team of workmates on the assembly line .
Civilians sat on benches joking and playing cards and rocking screaming babies to sleep .
